name: Project Lunch
description:
A game I worked on and updated, now available to play at itch.io!

Space Bar - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Select

________

A schoolgirl who can see monsters.

A guy who runs a food stall in front of the school.

And the story that brings them together! 

This is Project Lunch!

Play as Ryori Taiyaki, a kuudere who loves food and also has the ability to see monsters called "Ira".

Jump on weird monsters and rank up your score!

Collect LM ("Lunch Money")!

Buy items to use to help you go even further beyond!

Unlock story notes to see why this is all happening!

______

Leaderboard and Achievements are available on the mobile version of the game. 

-Copyright- Gamil Texidor / Studio Tsubaki 2018-2021
